colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE NAS PHYOGS BCU'I RGYAL BA SRAS DANG BCAS PA LA NYAM THAG PA'I GNAS TSUL GYIS GLU DBYANGS PHUL ZHING GSOL BA BTAB PAS, KHONG RNAMS KYIS KYANG MYUR BA MYUR BAR PHYOGS THAMS CAD NAS 'PHEL BAR MDZAD PAS, ^RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE SHIN TU DGA' STE RDZOGS LDAN BZHIN DU SLANG @007B RGYAS PAR 'GYUR RO, ,ZHES BYANG PHYOGS KYI SA MTHAR SKYES PA'I BAN CHUNG MKHAS GRUB ZER BAS SKYE 'GRO'I SPYOD TSUL DANG, BSTAN PA'I GNAS TSUL GYI NYAMS DANG SBYAR TE BRIS PA RANG NYID BYA ROG DKAR POR SGRUB STE 'DZAM BU GLING PA RNAMS DANG 'GRAS 'DOD PA MIN GYI, SKAL MNYAM 'GA' ZHIG LA'ANG PHAN PA'I SKABS SRID DAM SNYAM PA YIN PAS, KHYED 'GA' ZHIG GI THUGS LA PHOG TSE BZOD PA'I PHAN YON DRAN PAR ZHU ZHUM 'DIS GYANG RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,`AOm SVA STI, NGAGo GI DBANGo PHYUG 'JAM MGON TZONG KHA PA'I, ,RING LUGS MDO SNGAGS BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA MCHOG ,SA MTHAR SPEL MDZAD MKHASo BTZUN GRUBo @008A *, ,BRNYES PA, ,ZLA BRAL BSHES GNYEN CHEN POR GUS PHYAG 'TSAL, ,GANG GSUNGS LEGS BSHAD RGYAL BSTAN SPRINGS YIG 'DI, ,BLUN PO 'BRING MKHAN MTHONG TSE KHRO 'BAR MOD, ,CHOS GNANG MKHYEN PO TSUL BZHIN BRTZON RNAMS KYI, ,SNYID LA DGA' RGYAS GSHIS PHYIR SPAR DU BKOD, ,DGE 'DIS 'JAM MGON BLA MA'I MDO SNGAGS BSTAN, ,PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, ,DE 'DZIN ZHABS BRTAN DGE 'DUN CHOS SPYOD 'PHEL, ,YUL KHAMS DGE LEGS DPAL GYIS KHYAB GYUR CIG ,SPAR 'DI KHAL KHA GA-YAS RU YI, ,HU CAR THU YI HU RAL GYI, ,BKRA SHIS CHOS KYI GLING DU BYON, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED 'PHEL GYUR CIG , ,,
